title: account
description: A function from an imported library.

user.description: The username associated with the account

contact.description: Additional contact information associated with this account.

host.description: The host where the account is registered.

domain.description: The authentication domain where the account is registered.

posix:uid.description: The user ID of the account.

posix:gid.description: The primary group ID of the account.

posix:gecos.description: The GECOS field for the POSIX account.

posix:home.description: The path to the POSIX account's home directory.

posix:shell.description: The path to the POSIX account's default shell.

windows:sid.description: The Microsoft Windows Security Identifier of the account.

groups.description: An array of groups that the account is a member of.
